meanings.sent1: She was blubbing loudly after watching a sad movie.
meanings.sent2: The baby started blubbing when her favorite toy broke.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't help blubbing when he dropped his ice cream cone.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds blubbing tears onto the parched earth.
meanings.sent5: The blubbing child tugged at the heartstrings of the onlookers.

meanings.definition: The act of crying noisily and uncontrollably.
meanings.sent1: His blubbing woke up the entire household.
meanings.sent2: The blubbing of the child could be heard from the next room.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's blubbing over losing its favorite ball was quite dramatic.
meanings.sent4: The blubbing of the violin echoed through the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The blubbing at the funeral was a testament to the deep loss felt by all.
